a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Generic chart title to silence errors
The Historical Index of Human Development (HIHD) is a summary measure of average achievement in key
dimensions of human development: it represents an index of life expectancy, literacy rates, educational enrolment,
and per capita gross domestic product (GDP). This is shown below using an index which does include GDP versus
Historical Index of Human Development (without GDP metric)
Historical Index of Human Development (including GDP metric)
